title: Finding Happiness - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/27/21
itunes:title: Finding Happiness - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/27/21
description:
George Noory and author Carl Greer explore his journey leaving a successful business career that wasn't making him happy to become a clinical psychologist, ways to deal with situations you can't control in life, and how to overcome childhood trauma to create happy adult relationships.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
